sentence.text: Whereas regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II heterozygote apoptotic process have no detectable cardiac defects, loss of a Klf13 allele in cell-cell signaling heterozygote mice significantly increases the penetrance of cell-cell signaling-dependent cardiac abnormalities including atrial, atrial-ventricular and ventricular septal defects.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
